JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Production Workers for HKScan in Vinderup
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job nr. 170887

For HKScan in Vinderup, a large chicken factory, we are looking for skilled and stable employees for the production.

Are you looking for work? And can you start right away? If so, read on.

For HKScan in Vinderup, a large chicken factory, we are looking for skilled and stable employees for the production.

HKScan handles and delivers Danish high-quality chicken and as their new employee you’ll become part of a good working environment and good atmosphere, where you’ll contribute to the company’s success.

Today, there are more than 650 employees who take pride in handling products.

About the job
Your tasks will include:

· Operating machines and equipment,

· Adjusting the products in trays,

· Marinating

· Packing

· Delivering the products.

You will be part of a team of employees who work closely together. We offer you a job where there are good opportunities for permanent employment at the end of the temporary position.

We offer a good salary and employment conditions with i.a. fixed seniority supplement, Flexible Spending account and health insurance for all employees - if you obtain permanent employment

About you
To succeed in the job, you take responsibility for your work and get your tasks done. You do not need to have experience, but it is a clear advantage if you have experience from production with fast-moving consumer goods.

At HKScan, there are more than 30 nationalities with widely differing cultural backgrounds. Furthermore, it is expected that you speak Danish or English.

It is an advantage if you are in a good physical health, as the work takes place in a cold environment.

Working hours 
There may be changing working hours - so please write in your application which working hours you prefer (Day shifts and night shifts).

 

 

Transport options to Vinderup
The factory is located approx. 6 km outside Vinderup and approx. 20 km from Holstebro. There is no public transportation near the factory, so you must either have your own means of transport or have a car.

Does the job sound interesting?
So do not hesitate to apply right now, as we regularly hold interviews.

If you have any questions regarding the job or the process – feel free to give us a call on 70201835 and ask for Fatima or Lisa.

We look forward to hearing from you
